title: Heime nerfed, Need a Map change and..WTF?
body:
Played Heime today.. nerfed and owned.  really.. takes 5 hits with his wrench to kill a minion.. WTF.  Map is getting boring.. Can't you do a small change to it?  Sass it up a bit so everyone has to think.. maybe a random map?  WTF is up with levels?  I know you want to nickel/dime everyone for profit but at least give us something for Lv6/7. WTF????    How about an additional Mastery token or maybe a few more slots to the Runes.. why even bother with leveling up?  I have 33k IP... nothing to do with them..  make them into skin coins or something..

are you listening?   hello.....   are you out there?        Is this the direct line to India??.....

replies.body: Cant tell if trol- The guy below me summed it up perfectly.
cant tell if troll or serious
